sequenceIdentifier.description: Unique name or number that identifies attributes included in the coverage.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription >  gmd:dimension > gmd:MD:Band > gmd:sequenceIdentifier > gco:MemberName > gco:aName

sequenceIdentifierType.description: The type of unique name or number that identifies attributes.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription > gmd:dimension > gmd:MD:Band > gmd:sequenceIdentifier > gco:MemberName > gco:attributeType > gco:TypeName > gco:aName

attributeIdentifier.description: Identifiers for each attribute included in the resource. NOTE: These identifiers can be used to provide names for the attribute from a standard set of names.

minValue.description: The minimum value of data values in the domain of the attribute.

maxValue.description: The maximum value of data values in the domain of the attribute

units.description: The units of data in which the attribute is expressed.

ISO 19115-2: MI_CoverageDescription > gmd:dimension > gmd:MD_Band > gmd:units > gml:unitDefinition > gml:identifier

scaleFactor.description: The scale factor which has been applied to the attribute.

offset.description: The physical value corresponding to an attribute value of zero.

meanValue.description: The mean value of data values in the attribute.

numberOfValues.description: Tthe number of values used in a thematic-Classification resource.

standardDeviation.description: The standard deviation of data values in the attribute.

bitsPerValue.description: The maximum number of significant bits in the uncompressed representation for the value in each pixel.

boundMin.description: The shortest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band.

boundMax.description: The longest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band.

boundUnits.description: The unit in which sensor wavelengths are expressed.

peakResponse.description: The wavelength at which the sensor response is highest.

toneGradations.description: The number of discrete numerical values in the grid data.

bandBoundaryDefinition.description: Designation of criterion for defining maximum and minimum wavelengths for a spectral band.

nominalSpatialResolution.description: The smallest distance between which separate points can be distinguished, as specified in instrument design.

transferFunctionType.description: Type of transfer function to be used when scaling a physical value for a given element.
